212710.name: Party of Sin Soundtrack
212710.description:
This is the Full Soundtrack to the religiously-inspired puzzle-platformer Party of Sin, composed by Blake Allen. All tracks featured in the game are included in high-quality MP3 format. Relive your adventure as the Seven Deadly Sins from the depths of Hell to the highest reaches of Heaven in this exciting and varied album.

Track List:

  • Ossinikov
  • The Machines Will Rule
  • Purgatory
  • Goblet Of Doom
  • Gluttony
  • Eat Your Comrades
  • Envy
  • Arachnophobia
  • Industrial Living
  • Greed
  • Mining Till The End
  • Wrath
  • Airship Battle
  • Pride
  • Hell Hath No Fury
  • The Valley Of the Shadow Of Death
  • Lust
  • Earthly Delights
  • We Are All Sinners
  • Sloth
  • Pearly Gates
  • Jesus Farts
  • Gabriel Returns
212710.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
